item.title: Car Pool For Housing Societies and Offices
item.description: I quite often see posts on WhatsApp group asking people if they are going certain direction, either to drop something or someone. Offices typically see people pooling together. But there is a limitation with discovering people like this because you are restricted to the WhatsApp groups you are part of or the people you know. There is also any psychological barrier to ask such questions or post every day morning that Iâ€™m going to office and people can tag along.
